amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide a one year delay from the time the President announces the designation of a national monument under the Antiquities Act to when that designation would actually take effect.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the provision in the bill requiring the President to obtain the approval of Congress for proposed designation of monuments. The amendment would instead establish a one-year delay from the time a designation is made under the Antiquities Act to when the designation takes effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 224 (Roll no. 493).
